title: Work from home jobs: Over 90% tech firms are preferring hybrid work model - India Today
content: Work from home jobs: Over 90% tech firms are preferring hybrid work model  India Today
description: In its "Future of Work – India Outlook", the report said nearly 70 per cent of organizations in the tech industry in India have adopted a hybrid work model and 85 per cent of India’s tech workforce is working remotely or in a hybrid setup.
